mapper.update: update gd_enumeration set createby = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displayno = #{displayno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mapping = #{mapping,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organId = #{organid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thecode = #{thecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thekey = #{thekey,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thevalue = #{thevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, createby, createtime, deleted, description, displayno, mapping, `name`, organId, parentid, thecode, thekey, thevalue from gd_enumeration where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
